roleset.name: to joke or deceive, "just kidding", joking, fooling
roleset.note: KID-V NOTES: Frames file for 'kid' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. Comparison with 'joke'. (from kid.01-v predicate notes)
JK-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. (from jk.01-v)
KIDDING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-5, kid-v.01. No VNcls. (from kidding.01-n)

example.name: rel: jk
example.text: I m jk . What r u up too

example.name: discoursey
example.text: On the matter of new neuron growth , no kidding ? Which neurons ?

example.name: all args
example.text: I know that despite his kidding us that he hadn't had time to prepare his sermon he'd in fact put a lot of thought into it.
example.arg: that he hadn't had time to prepare his sermon
